participant_1.background:
I took my camera with me to take photos of the beautiful scenery and interesting people I met.
I know my family from growing up together.
I prefer to listen to my own music on my own terms.
My dog is my best friend, so I'd love to have lunch with him and learn some new tricks to teach him.
i want to own a house on a beach.

i can do many celebrity impressions.

content.text: Hello! What is your favorite show? I like The Voice.
I like The Voice too! My favorite celebrity impression is of Adele.
Oh nice! I have tried to do that one before, but I can't quite nail it.
I've been doing it for years! My family teases me for being clumsy, but I think it's all part of my charm.
Oh I'm clumsy too! My dog is my best friend, so I'd love to have lunch with him and learn some new tricks to teach him.
That's so sweet! My boyfriend loves fast food, but I'm trying to eat healthier.
I understand that! I took my camera with me to take photos of the beautiful scenery and interesting people I met.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm trying to be more mindful of my actions and words.
That's a good goal! I want to own a house on the beach one day.
That would be amazing! I'm happy where I am right now, but I'm always looking for new adventures.
I'm the same way! I love meeting new people and trying new things.
Me too! It's what makes life so much fun
